title: Covid travel rules: Portugal removed from UK green list as seven others join red list
content:
1. Covid travel rules: Portugal removed from UK green list as seven others join red list  BBC News
  2. 'Safety first' behind Portugal removed from travel green list, claims transport secretary  Guardian News
  3. No new countries to be added to UK's travel 'green list' on Thursday - The Sun  Reuters
  4. What countries could be added to the UK's holiday green list? | ITV News  ITV News
  5. Tour groups and airlines shed more than £2bn after Portugal downgrade  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: コヴィドのトラベルルール ポルトガルが英国のグリーンリストから除外され、他の7カ国がレッドリストに加わる
Covid旅行规则。葡萄牙从英国绿名单中删除，其他七国加入红名单
Covid旅行規則。葡萄牙從英國綠名單中刪除，其他七國加入紅名單
